citation: Proclamation under the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 fix 1 August 2018 as the day on which section 38 of that Act commences.

17 July 2018

H. M. WOOD

Administrator

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 July 2018
